title: How to Get Basic Actions in Wakfu

steps.headline: Go toward the teleporter to the Crozilily Meadow.
Turn right and step on the stone block.
Search for a big rock.
steps.description: Behind the big rock, there'll be a chest.

steps.headline: Open the chest and obtain the emote!
Give the Wolly Legs to Wolfgang.
Defeat 10 training dummies.
steps.description: The reward will be this emote.

steps.headline: Get a friend to help you.
Stand on one trigger while your friend stands on another.
Get two friends to help you.
Stand in the middle while your friends stand on the two triggers.
After one of you gets the chest, swap places until all of you have the emote.
Wait for a Crazy Lumberjane to spawn.
Defeat her and she will drop the scroll for this emote.

text: Getting "Say Hi" Go toward the teleporter to the Crozilily Meadow.  Turn right and step on the stone block.  Follow the secret path.  Getting "Yawn" Go to Soul's Crossing.  Search for a big rock. Behind the big rock, there'll be a chest. Open the chest and obtain the emote!  Getting "Be Scared" Go to Crozilily Meadow.  Get 4 Wolly Legs.  Give the Wolly Legs to Wolfgang.  Getting "Cry" Go to Crozilily Meadow.  Get 3 Wolly Seeds.  Plant the Wolly Seeds.  Talk to Mimi.  Getting "Bow" Go to Kanojedo.  Defeat 10 training dummies. The reward will be this emote. Getting "Point" Get a friend to help you.  Go to southwest.  Stand on one trigger while your friend stands on another.  Getting "Laugh" Get two friends to help you.  Go to southeast.  Stand in the middle while your friends stand on the two triggers.  After one of you gets the chest, swap places until all of you have the emote.  Getting "Red With Rage" Go to Soul's Crossing.  Wait for a Crazy Lumberjane to spawn.  Defeat her and she will drop the scroll for this emote.
